subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dick Hoak ended an unprecedented 45 seasons with the Pittsburgh Steelers by retiring Tuesday as running backs coach, completing the longest continuous tenure by an N.F.L. assistant coach with any team.
snippet: Dick Hoak ended an unprecedented 45 seasons with the Pittsburgh Steelers by retiring Tuesday as running backs coach, completing the longest continuous tenure by an N.F.L. assistant coach with any team.
